name: The Circle (Elotha)
description:
There is the ball and the black hole. You can control the black hole with your mouse. The black hole creates a gravititational field. You can affect the ball by using this field. Try to keep the ball inside the circle and aim for the highest score.

This is my first completed game. If you encounter any bugs or typos (my English is not perfect), write a comment below and please let me know. I also want to know your highscore. Enjoy!
